======Sets sentry firing tesla======
= Description =

Controls all sentry can firing tesla to stun alien. Sentry will stop firing tesla after alien has stunned and continue to shoot the alien if [[asw_sentry_tesla.wiki|asw_sentry_tesla]] is enabled.
